forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 60. West wind 7 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The morning light drapes over Downtown San Francisco with a gentle caress, offering a partly sunny sky that hints at the warmth of the day to come. With a high expected to hover around a comfortable 60 degrees, the air fills with the crispness characteristic of coastal serenity, punctuated by a pleasant west wind rustling softly through the streets, whispering promises of a refreshing day. Although a layer of marine fog emerges from the Pacific, obscuring the immediate view of the Golden Gate, it retreats gracefully as the sun climbs higher, revealing a picturesque cityscape dotted with the iconic silhouettes of rooftops and the pulse of life below.

As evening approaches, the air will mellow into a cool embrace, drifting down to a low around 50 degrees, perfect for a serene stroll along the waterfront or a cozy gathering in a local café. Dress in layers to navigate the shifting temperatures, perhaps a light sweater or jacket that can be easily shed as the sun brings its warmth. Engage in the delightful mundanity of life today: wander through Golden Gate Park, explore the artisan shops of the Mission District, or simply savor a quiet moment with a book under the golden glow of the sun. There’s a tranquil beauty in the day’s promise, inviting both exploration and moments of reflection.
